trans-unit.source: Specifies the date and time format the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control displays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o formato de data e hora exibido pelo controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Essa enumeração é usada por membros como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The actual date/time formats are determined by the date, time, and regional settings set in the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: A data/hora real formatos são determinados pelas configurações regionais definidas no sistema operacional do usuário, data e hora.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates initializing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> object by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat> value.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra a inicializar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> objeto definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker.Format%2A> para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePickerFormat> valor.

trans-unit.source: To run this example paste the following code in a form and call `InitializeDateTimePicker` from the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo colar o código a seguir em um formulário e chamada `InitializeDateTimePicker` do construtor do formulário ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> método manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control displays the date/time value in a custom format.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> exibe o valor de data/hora em um formato personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control displays the date/time value in the long date format set by the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> exibe o valor de data/hora no formato de data completa definido pelo sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control displays the date/time value in the short date format set by the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> exibe o valor de data/hora no formato de data abreviada definido pelo sistema operacional do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> control displays the date/time value in the time format set by the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker" /> exibe o valor de data/hora no formato de hora definido pelo sistema operacional do usuário.
